slides.title: Testing expressions extended
slides.description: Variable types and set variables

slides.title: Simple Application
slides.description: First, write a small application to change some values...

slides.title: Open the Testing window
slides.description: Click on &lt/&gt to the left of the terminal window.

slides.title: Reset list of expressions
slides.description: Reset testing list to a startingpoint by dropping old entrys

slides.title: Set Name
slides.description: First assign the name that you will see in chart

slides.title: Set Expression
slides.description: Next assign an expression that you would like to observe

slides.title: Select type of variable
slides.description:
Lastly, select the type of expression.
Number will shown as a line in the chart

slides.title: Add to expression list
slides.description: Click on this button to add the new expression.

slides.title: Remove old expressions
slides.description: Any expressions that you don't need any more...

slides.title: Remove old expressions
slides.description: And remove one more...

slides.title: Set Name
slides.description: Assign a name for a second value

slides.title: Set Expression
slides.description: Assign an expression for a 2nd value

slides.title: Select type of variable
slides.description:
Select the type of expression.
Text will show a point on each change, and will show data when you move the mouse over it

slides.title: Add to expression list
slides.description: Click on this button to add the new expression.

slides.title: Set Name
slides.description: Assign a name for a third value

slides.title: Set Expression
slides.description: Assign an expression for a 3rd value

slides.title: Select type of variable
slides.description: Select the type of expression...

slides.title: Add to expression list
slides.description: Add the 3rd Expression...

slides.title: Add action
slides.description: Now lets add an action

slides.title: Reset actionlist
slides.description: Reset action list to a startingpoint by dropping old entrys

slides.title: Set Name
slides.description: Assign a name for the action

slides.title: Set Expression
slides.description: Assign a JavaScript expression for the action

slides.title: Add to Actions
slides.description: Finally, add the action as a simple assignment

slides.title: Send source
slides.description: Send the test application to the board

slides.title: Start fetching expressions
slides.description: Click on the run button to start testing. Values update once a second so it'll take a few seconds to see the results.

slides.title: Wait
slides.description: Watch the chart change for a few seconds...

slides.title: Action
slides.description:
Assign a new value to the action expression...
Lets change the expression b to 1

slides.title: Assign value
slides.description: Assign the value to variable b on Espruino

slides.title: Wait
slides.description: Now you can see the changes in the chart...

slides.title: Stop fetching expressions
slides.description: Finally, click to stop refreshing the chart...

slides.title: Switch back to the terminal
slides.description: And switch back to Terminal mode.

slides.title: All Done
slides.description: That's it!
